projects.title: Analytical System (BPCL)
projects.bodyText:
- Worked with client's management team to analyze and optimize then day to day information distribution system.
 -  Reviewed code, debugged problems, and corrected issues.
 - Discussed project progress with client, collected feedback on different stages and directly addressed concerns.
 - Provided software application engineering and maintenance for development lifecycle.

projects.title: Digital System (BPCL)
projects.bodyText:
- Worked with client's management team to examine and digitize then paper based data handling system.
 - Built a digital solution to replace client's daily data collection systems.
 - Facilitated the client by solving complex problems, building solution frameworks and leading initiatives.

projects.title: Creati AI (SAAS AI Platform)
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a robust platform using Next.js that offers five distinct AI-driven services: Conversation, Code Generation, Image Generation, Video Generation, and Music Generation.
 - Integrated Clerk for user authentication and Stripe for payment processing, enabling users to register, access 5 free prompts, and upgrade to a Pro plan for unlimited access.
 - Utilized Prisma for efficient database management, Radix-UI for accessible UI components, Replicate for model deployment, and TailwindCSS for responsive design.
 - Implemented a scalable architecture that supports a freemium model, encouraging user engagement and providing a clear upgrade path for enhanced service access.

projects.title: Tic Tac Toe
projects.bodyText:
- Tic Tac Toe game app based on react-native-cli.
 - A react-native-cli based game in which two players take turns in drawing either an ' O' or an ' X' in one square of a grid consisting of nine squares.
 - The winner is the first player to get three of the same symbols in a row.

projects.title: Refinery Data Tracker
projects.bodyText: - A react app to track and submit real time critical data across various locations in a google sheet.

projects.title: EdTech Platform
projects.bodyText: - A platform to bridge the gap between Teachers and Students.

projects.title: Wings 2019
projects.bodyText: - Official website of 2019 Technical Event of Government College of Engineering, Aurangabad.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.bodyText:
- A hybrid app to give weather forecast.
 - The app predicts the best day to sell an umbrella and a jacket.
 - It also gives advice on which days should you wear a hat.

projects.title: Typing Master
projects.bodyText: - A react app to master your typing skills.

projects.title: Site Underconstruction Template
projects.bodyText: - A template to show on your domain till the actual website is being built.
